title: Loreal Dream Blonde Complete Color System - #11 Glistening Magnolia
description: L'Oreal dream blonde's hair color - extra light blonde 11 combines breakthrough conditioning technology with anti-brass actives to ensure beautiful layers of color and light for the most ethereal blonde. The salon inspired hair care regime protects color with antioxidants and dual UV filters. Helps to defy fade out for brilliant color and silky shine. Make hair pure, delicate, luminous blonde that lasts.

title: Organic Root Stimulator Olive Oil Moisturizing Hair Lotion
description: Organic Root Stimulator Olive Oil Moisturizing Hair Lotion restores hair's natural moisture balance.

title: Redken All Soft Argan-6 Multi-Care Oil for Hair, 3 Ounce
description: Intensely nourish and protect dry, brittle hair. Argan-6 with omega-6 enriched argan oil provides concentrated softness, deep conditioning and lasting suppleness. Versatile treatment can be used in six ways. Use before your shampoo or blow-dry for added moisture, after you blow-dry to smooth and block humidity, on damp or dry hair to boost shine, added to treatments to intensify replenishment or overnight for deep nourishment.
